articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Afghan official: Bombs kill 2 children in northern province
articles.description: An Afghan official says that two bombs have gone off near-simultaneously on a roadside in the country's north, killing two children and wounding nine people
articles.content:
KABUL, Afghanistan -- 
Two bombs went off near-simultaneously on a road in northern Afghanistan on Tuesday, killing two children and wounding nine people, a local official said. 
The explosions took place in the city of Mazr-i Sharif, the provincial capital… [+762 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: China's exports end 2019 up 0.5% despite US tariff war
articles.description: China's exports rose 0.5% in 2019 despite a tariff war with Washington after growth rebounded in December on stronger demand from other markets
articles.content:
BEIJING -- 
China's exports rose 0.5% in 2019 despite a tariff war with Washington after growth rebounded in December on stronger demand from other markets.

articles.author: SONIA PÉREZ D. Associated Press
articles.title: Guatemala to swear in conservative Giammattei as president
articles.description: Guatemala will swear in Alejandro Giammattei, a conservative physician opposed to gay marriage and abortion, as its new president Tuesday while the country's outgoing leader exits amid swirling corruption accusations
articles.content:

articles.author: Karma Allen
articles.title: New arrest made in woman's 1990 murder; husband cleared
articles.description: Investigators described the new suspect as a former friend of the couple.
articles.content:
Authorities dropped charges against an Alabama man who was accused of killing his wife 30 years ago, saying another man has confessed to the murder.
Police in Ozark, Alabama, arrested Jeff Beasley, 54, in the 1990 death of Tracy Harris, who was found dead in… [+3341 chars]

articles.content:
